featured.text: The King agreed and gave Nehemiah a letter “to the governors of the province beyond the river,” requesting safe passage for him as he travelled through their lands.

definition.zh_def: 州長；省長；負責管理某個地區的官員。
definition.en_def: The elected executive head of a state in the U.S. or a similar official in other countries.
definition.example: The governor announced new policies to improve education in the state.
